I can't do that.  It would open an extradiminsonal tear in the fabric of reality that would destroy absolutely EVERYTHING we know as the universe today.

But what you can do, is click on DETAILS, then RIGHT CLICK on the movies that you DO NOT WANT to download, and choose DOWNLOAD NEVER.  This works in Bittornado, ABC, and a few others.

Give it a try.  Let me know if it works for you.
hell yeah I dimly remember these flicks as abso-fucking-bloody-lutely great!! good torrent dude these are perfect, and yes I am gonna watch them while stoned/drugged out of my mind..cheers dude!
